description: Everton sign Barcelona defender Martina Fernandez on loan until the end of the season.
title: Everton sign Barcelona's Martina Fernandez on loan to end of season
title_page: Everton sign Barcelona's Martina Fernandez on loan to end of season  - BBC Sport
maintext:
Everton have signed Barcelona defender Martina Fernandez on loan until the end of the season.
The 20-year-old becomes the club's second signing of the January transfer window after the arrival of France striker Kelly Gago.
The Spain Under-23s international was part of the Barcelona squad that won last season's Women's Champions League.
"I am so excited to be here and I cannot wait to play," Fernandez told Everton's official club channel.
"I know Everton is a historic club and that the fans are very supportive so I cannot wait to meet them.
"They can expect hard work from me. I will give my everything on the pitch."
